title: Lazer Racer Free Watch Face
summary: Start your Engines! Android Wear Smart Watch Face - Awesome Dim Mode
description: Free Android Wear Watch! descriptionHTML:
Free Android Wear Watch! (For a limited time)

This watch face has a fantastic glow that is almost unparalleled for an ANDROID WEAR compatible watch face device.

Break out of the ordinary with modern racing style.

- Has Digital & Analog Time
- Step Counter that works with Google Fit (or standalone)
- Date


Compatible with most Android Wear smart watch faces

We support the following smartwatches;

- MOTOROLA MOTO 360
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 2
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 SPORT
- MOTOROLA MOTO WOMAN
- ASUS ZENWATCH 3
- LG G WATCH R
- LG URBANE 1ST AND 2ND GEN (NOT LTE)
- HUAWEI
- FOSSIL Q FOUNDER
- FOSSIL Q MARSHAL
- FOSSIL Q WANDER
- TAG HEUER CONNECTED
- MICHAEL KORS
- NIXON MISSION
- CASIO SMART OUTDOOR WATCH

Look for Racer Deluxe & Racer Deluxe Green coming soon. Has many useful features
comments: I feel compelled to write a review of this app. It is absolutely beautiful. I am mad about watches and this app alone is making me want to update my smartwatch. I love this type of display and there are so many good ones to choose from I just can't choose which I like best. Absolutely great craftsmanship here!
Absolutely Fantastic!! Crisp. Clean & Brilliant Lum. Beautifully done! A tap action to show/hide digital time would be great. Thank you! üòé‚åöüëç
